languages.text: "Все верно. Из офицеров блюстителей только Аврилла за нас заступилась. Сразу видно, у кого мать с нижних палуб, а кто вырос на своих средних и не знает сочувствия к нам!" {n}Мрачноватый мужчина с заметными шрамами на лице разводит руками.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, мы не злодеи какие, мы честные рабочие люди и ваши слуги. Мы беспорядков не устраивали, открыто вышли на забастовку, а на нас тут ружья наставляют. Мы всего-то и делаем, что просим дать нам спокойно работать и не зверствовать".

"It's all true. Vent is the only enforcer officer who's stood up for us. It's clear as day who had a mother from the lower decks, and who grew up amidships and has no fellow feeling toward us!" {n}The grim man with a scarred face throws up his arms.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, we're no villains here, we're honest workers, your servants. We've plotted no disorder, we went on strike openly, and now we've got guns pointed at us. All we're doing is asking to be allowed to work in peace, without being harassed."
languages.original_text: "Все верно. Из офицеров блюстителей только Аврилла за нас заступилась. Сразу видно, у кого мать с нижних палуб, а кто вырос на своих средних и не знает сочувствия к нам!" {n}Мрачноватый мужчина с заметными шрамами на лице разводит руками.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, мы не злодеи какие, мы честные рабочие люди и ваши слуги. Мы беспорядков не устраивали, открыто вышли на забастовку, а на нас тут ружья наставляют. Мы всего-то и делаем, что просим дать нам спокойно работать и не зверствовать".

traits.locale_text: "It's all true. Vent is the only guard officer who's stood up for us. It's clear as day who had a mother from the lower decks, and who grew up amidships and has no fellow feeling toward us!" {n}The grim man with a scarred face throws up his arms.{/n} "Your Grace, we're no villains here, we're honest workers, your servants. We've plotted no disorder, we went on strike openly, and now we've got guns pointed at us. All we're doing is asking to be allowed to work in peace, without being harassed."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

We've plotted no disorder, we went on strike openly, and now we've got guns pointed at us. All we're doing is asking to be allowed to work in peace, without being harassed."

languages.text: “这些都是真的，只有温特长官愿意站出来为我们说话。哪些人是在底层甲板上长大的，哪些人完全不把我们当人看，这些我们都看得很清楚！”{n}这个满脸伤疤、脸色阴沉的人举起了双手。{/n}“大人，我们不是坏人。我们是诚实的工人，都是你的仆人。我们没有策划叛乱，我们仅仅是在公开罢工而已，可现在这群人却在用枪指着我们。我们只希望能安安心心地工作，不要有人骚扰我们。我们想要的只有这些。”
languages.original_text: "It's all true. Vent is the only enforcer officer who's stood up for us. It's clear as day who had a mother from the lower decks, and who grew up amidships and has no fellow feeling toward us!" {n}The grim man with a scarred face throws up his arms.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, we're no villains here, we're honest workers, your servants. We've plotted no disorder, we went on strike openly, and now we've got guns pointed at us. All we're doing is asking to be allowed to work in peace, without being harassed."

traits.locale_text: “这些都是真的，只有温特长官愿意站出来为我们说话。哪些人是在底层甲板上长大的，哪些人完全不把我们当人看，这些我们都看得很清楚！”{n}这个满脸伤疤、脸色阴沉的人举起了双手。{/n}“大人，我们不是坏人。我们是诚实的工人，都是你的仆人。我们没有策划叛乱，我们仅仅是在公开罢工而已，可现在这群人却在用枪指着我们。我们只希望能安安心心地工作，不要有人骚扰我们。我们想要的只有这些。”
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

languages.text: «Es la verdad. Vent es la única guardia que nos ha defendido. ¡Está muy claro quién ha nacido de una madre de las cubiertas inferiores y quién ha crecido a media nave y no tiene ninguna simpatía por nosotros!». {n}El hombre siniestro con una cicatriz en la cara alza los brazos.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, nosotros no somos villanos, sino trabajadores honrados. Sus sirvientes. No hemos organizado ningún disturbio: solo hemos ido a la huelga pacíficamente y ahora nos están apuntando con sus armas. Solo queremos trabajar en paz, sin sufrir abusos».
languages.original_text: "It's all true. Vent is the only enforcer officer who's stood up for us. It's clear as day who had a mother from the lower decks, and who grew up amidships and has no fellow feeling toward us!" {n}The grim man with a scarred face throws up his arms.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, we're no villains here, we're honest workers, your servants. We've plotted no disorder, we went on strike openly, and now we've got guns pointed at us. All we're doing is asking to be allowed to work in peace, without being harassed."

traits.locale_text: «Es la verdad. Vent es la única guardia que nos ha defendido. ¡Está muy claro quién ha nacido de una madre de las cubiertas inferiores y quién ha crecido a media nave y no tiene ninguna simpatía por nosotros!». {n}El hombre siniestro con una cicatriz en la cara alza los brazos.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, nosotros no somos villanos, sino trabajadores honrados. Sus sirvientes. No hemos organizado ningún disturbio: solo hemos ido a la huelga pacíficamente y ahora nos están apuntando con sus armas. Solo queremos trabajar en paz, sin sufrir abusos».
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

languages.text: 「すべて真実さ。ヴェントは俺たちのために立ち上がった唯一のエンフォーサーだ。下層デッキ出身の母親を持っていても中層育ちの連中は、俺達に対する仲間意識がないのは火を見るより明らかだ！」{n}顔に傷のある男が腕を振り上げる。{/n}「陛下、俺たちは悪人じゃあない。俺達は誠実な労働者で、あんたのしもべだ。俺達は無秩序を企てたわけじゃない。公然とストライキを行い、そして今、銃を向けられているだけだ。俺たちは、嫌がらせを受けることなく、平和に働かせてほしいだけなんだ」
languages.original_text: "It's all true. Vent is the only enforcer officer who's stood up for us. It's clear as day who had a mother from the lower decks, and who grew up amidships and has no fellow feeling toward us!" {n}The grim man with a scarred face throws up his arms.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, we're no villains here, we're honest workers, your servants. We've plotted no disorder, we went on strike openly, and now we've got guns pointed at us. All we're doing is asking to be allowed to work in peace, without being harassed."

traits.locale_text: 「すべて真実さ。ヴェントは俺たちのために立ち上がった唯一のエンフォーサーだ。下層デッキ出身の母親を持っていても中層育ちの連中は、俺達に対する仲間意識がないのは火を見るより明らかだ！」{n}顔に傷のある男が腕を振り上げる。{/n}「陛下、俺たちは悪人じゃあない。俺達は誠実な労働者で、あんたのしもべだ。俺達は無秩序を企てたわけじゃない。公然とストライキを行い、そして今、銃を向けられているだけだ。俺たちは、嫌がらせを受けることなく、平和に働かせてほしいだけなんだ」
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

languages.text: "Es ist alles wahr. Vent ist der einzige Offizier der Enforcers, der sich für uns eingesetzt hat. Es ist glasklar, wer eine Mutter von den Unterdecks hatte, und wer mittschiffs aufgewachsen ist und keinerlei Verbindung zu uns empfindet!" {n}Der düstere Mann mit dem vernarbten Gesicht lässt verzweifelt die Arme fallen.{/n} "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, wir sind keine Schurken, wir sind ehrliche Arbeiter, Eure Diener. Wir haben keinen geheimen Aufstand geplant, wir haben offen gestreikt, und nun werden Waffen auf uns gerichtet. Wir bitten nur darum, in Frieden arbeiten zu können, ohne tyrannisiert zu werden."
languages.original_text: "It's all true. Vent is the only enforcer officer who's stood up for us. It's clear as day who had a mother from the lower decks, and who grew up amidships and has no fellow feeling toward us!" {n}The grim man with a scarred face throws up his arms.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, we're no villains here, we're honest workers, your servants. We've plotted no disorder, we went on strike openly, and now we've got guns pointed at us. All we're doing is asking to be allowed to work in peace, without being harassed."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist alles wahr. Vent ist der einzige Offizier der Enforcers, der sich für uns eingesetzt hat. Es ist glasklar, wer eine Mutter von den Unterdecks hatte, und wer mittschiffs aufgewachsen ist und keinerlei Verbindung zu uns empfindet!" {n}Der düstere Mann mit dem vernarbten Gesicht lässt verzweifelt die Arme fallen.{/n} "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, wir sind keine Schurken, wir sind ehrliche Arbeiter, Eure Diener. Wir haben keinen geheimen Aufstand geplant, wir haben offen gestreikt, und nun werden Waffen auf uns gerichtet. Wir bitten nur darum, in Frieden arbeiten zu können, ohne tyrannisiert zu werden."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

languages.text: « C'est la vérité. Vent est le seul officier du service d'ordre à prendre notre défense. On voit tout de suite qui ici est né d'une mère originaire des ponts inférieurs, et qui au contraire a grandi sur les ponts intermédiaires et nous traite comme des moins que rien ! » {n}L'homme à la mine sévère et au visage couturé de cicatrices lève les bras au ciel.{/n} « On est pas méchants, Votre Seigneurie. On travaille dur et on vous est fidèles, vous savez. On a pas cherché à semer la pagaille, et voilà qu'on se retrouve avec des fusils braqués sur nous juste pour avoir osé appeler à la grève. Tout ce qu'on demande, c'est de pouvoir travailler en paix sans subir de pressions ou de persécutions. »
languages.original_text: "It's all true. Vent is the only enforcer officer who's stood up for us. It's clear as day who had a mother from the lower decks, and who grew up amidships and has no fellow feeling toward us!" {n}The grim man with a scarred face throws up his arms.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, we're no villains here, we're honest workers, your servants. We've plotted no disorder, we went on strike openly, and now we've got guns pointed at us. All we're doing is asking to be allowed to work in peace, without being harassed."

traits.locale_text: « C'est la vérité. Vent est le seul officier du service d'ordre à prendre notre défense. On voit tout de suite qui ici est né d'une mère originaire des ponts inférieurs, et qui au contraire a grandi sur les ponts intermédiaires et nous traite comme des moins que rien ! » {n}L'homme à la mine sévère et au visage couturé de cicatrices lève les bras au ciel.{/n} « On est pas méchants, Votre Seigneurie. On travaille dur et on vous est fidèles, vous savez. On a pas cherché à semer la pagaille, et voilà qu'on se retrouve avec des fusils braqués sur nous juste pour avoir osé appeler à la grève. Tout ce qu'on demande, c'est de pouvoir travailler en paix sans subir de pressions ou de persécutions. »
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

languages.text: "Doğru söylüyor. Bize bir tek Teğmen Vent destek oldu. Alt güverteli olduğu apaçık belli. Alt güverteli olmayanlar da bize karşı tavırlarıyla kendilerini gösteriyorlar!" {n}Yaralı yüzüyle haşin görünen adam, kollarını açıyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, bizim bir suçumuz yok. Ekmeğinin derdinde işçileriz biz, size hizmet ederiz. İsyan çıkarmak gibi bir niyetimiz yoktu, yalnızca grev yapmak istedik. Gelgelelim bize silah doğrultuldu. Tek amacımız huzur içinde ve rahatsız edilmeden çalışabileceğimiz şartlara ulaşmaktır."
languages.original_text: "It's all true. Vent is the only enforcer officer who's stood up for us. It's clear as day who had a mother from the lower decks, and who grew up amidships and has no fellow feeling toward us!" {n}The grim man with a scarred face throws up his arms.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, we're no villains here, we're honest workers, your servants. We've plotted no disorder, we went on strike openly, and now we've got guns pointed at us. All we're doing is asking to be allowed to work in peace, without being harassed."

Alt güverteli olmayanlar da bize karşı tavırlarıyla kendilerini gösteriyorlar!" {n}Yaralı yüzüyle haşin görünen adam, kollarını açıyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, bizim bir suçumuz yok. Ekmeğinin derdinde işçileriz biz, size hizmet ederiz. İsyan çıkarmak gibi bir niyetimiz yoktu, yalnızca grev yapmak istedik. Gelgelelim bize silah doğrultuldu. Tek amacımız huzur içinde ve rahatsız edilmeden çalışabileceğimiz şartlara ulaşmaktır."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong
